org.flixel.FlxRect

Packages that use FlxRect

Uses of FlxRect in org.flixel
 

Subclasses of FlxRect in org.flixel
 class FlxButton
          A simple button class that calls a function when clicked by the mouse.
 class FlxEmitter
          FlxEmitter is a lightweight particle emitter.
 class FlxGroup
          This is an organizational class that can update and render a bunch of FlxObjects.
 class FlxObject
          This is the base class for most of the display objects (FlxSprite, FlxText, etc).
 class FlxQuadTree
          A fairly generic quad tree structure for rapid overlap checks.
 class FlxSound
          This is the universal flixel sound object, used for streaming, music, and sound effects.
 class FlxSprite
          The main "game object" class, handles basic physics and animation.
 class FlxText
          Extends FlxSprite to support rendering text.
 class FlxTileblock
          This is the basic "environment object" class, used to create simple walls and floors.
 class FlxTilemap
          This is a traditional tilemap display and collision class.
 

Fields in org.flixel declared as FlxRect
static FlxRect FlxQuadTree.bounds
          This variable stores the dimensions of the root of the quad tree.
 FlxRect FlxObject.colHullX
          These store a couple of useful numbers for speeding up collision resolution.
 FlxRect FlxObject.colHullY
          These store a couple of useful numbers for speeding up collision resolution.
 

Uses of FlxRect in org.flixel.data
 

Subclasses of FlxRect in org.flixel.data
 class FlxDigitalPad
           
 class FlxFade
          This is a special effects utility class to help FlxGame do the 'fade' effect.
 class FlxFlash
          This is a special effects utility class to help FlxGame do the 'flash' effect
 class FlxLogoPixel
          This automates the color-rotation effect on the 'f' logo during game launch, not used in actual game code.
 class FlxParticle
           
 class FlxPause
          This is the default flixel pause screen.
